extends CcddInformationTreeHandler

    • Constructor Detail

      • CcddAssignmentTreeHandler

        CcddAssignmentTreeHandler(CcddMain ccddMain,
                          java.lang.String rateMsgFilter,
                          CcddLinkHandler linkHandler,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> treePathOrder,
                          java.awt.Component parent)
        Assignment tree handler class constructor
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class
        rateMsgFilter - rate column name and message name, separated by a back slash
        linkHandler - reference to the link handler
        treePathOrder - list of all paths in the variable tree in the order to be maintained in the assignment tree; null to not force the order
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog

    • Method Detail

      • getHeaderNodeLevel

        protected int getHeaderNodeLevel()
        Get the node index that skips the root level (there are no filters for the assignment tree)
        Overrides:
        getHeaderNodeLevel in class CcddInformationTreeHandler
        Returns:
        Node index that skips the root level

      • getItemNodeLevel

        protected int getItemNodeLevel()
        Get the node level that skips any active filter nodes. The assignment tree has no extra header nodes, but instead begins with the root structure tables
        Overrides:
        getItemNodeLevel in class CcddInformationTreeHandler
        Returns:
        Node level for root structure tables

      • initialize

        protected void initialize(CcddMain ccddMain,
                          CcddUndoHandler undoHandler,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> assignDefinitions)
        Perform initialization steps prior to building the assignment tree
        Specified by:
        initialize in class CcddInformationTreeHandler
        Parameters:
        ccddMain - main class
        undoHandler - reference to the undo handler
        assignDefinitions - list containing the assignment definitions

      • buildTree

        protected void buildTree(boolean filterByApp,
                         java.lang.String filterValue,
                         boolean filterFlag,
                         java.awt.Component parent)
        Build the assignment tree from the database. Retain the tree's current expansion state
        Overrides:
        buildTree in class CcddInformationTreeHandler
        Parameters:
        filterByApp - true if the tree is filtered by application. This is not applicable to the assignment tree, which can only contain structure references
        filterValue - rate column name and message name, separated by a back slash
        filterFlag - flag used to filter the tree content. Not used for the assignment tree
        parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog

      • updateMessageName

        protected void updateMessageName(java.lang.String oldName,
                                 java.lang.String newName)
        Update references to the specified message name with the new name. This is necessary for the tree to be rebuilt following a message name change
        Parameters:
        oldName - original message name
        newName - new message name

      • getSelectedVariables

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSelectedVariables()
        Get the parent structure and variable path for the selected node(s)
        Returns:
        List containing the full path array(s) for the selected variable(s)

      • updateAssignmentDefinitions

        protected void updateAssignmentDefinitions(java.util.List<CcddClassesDataTable.Message> messages,
                                           java.lang.String rateName)
        Update the assignment definition list for the specified rate based on the supplied message list
        Parameters:
        messages - list of messages for the specified rate
        rateName - rate column name

      • addAssignmentDefinition

        private void addAssignmentDefinition(CcddClassesDataTable.Message message,
                                     java.lang.String rateName,
                                     CcddClassesDataTable.Variable variable)
        Add the specified variable to the assignment definition for the specified rate and message
        Parameters:
        message - message for which the variable is a member
        rateName - rate column name
        variable - variable to add to the assignment definition

      • createTreePanel

        protected javax.swing.JPanel createTreePanel(int selectionMode)
        Create an assignment tree panel. The table tree is placed in a scroll pane. A check box is added that allows tree expansion/collapse
        Parameters:
        selectionMode - tree item selection mode (single versus multiple)
        Returns:
        JPanel containing the assignment tree components

        Specified by:
        addInformation in class CcddInformationTreeHandler
        Parameters:

        nameOfCopy - name of the copy of the node
